section.p: There are only a few ships for sale and there is not much to choose between them. Choose from the types listed here.
You get to give your ship a name. Record this and other details on your Ship’s Manifest. The Crew Quality is poor.
Each time you arrive at a destination, change the entry in the Docked column on the Ship’s Manifest to the ship’s new location. Currently your ship is docked at Smogmaw, of course.
